title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2975/87 of 2 October 1987 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1678/85 as regards the agricultural conversion rate for the pigmeat sector in Greece
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2975/87
of 2 October 1987
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1678/85 as regards the agricultural conversion rate for the pigmeat sector in Greece
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Annex IV of Regulation (EEC) No 1678/85, as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 2594/87, the line relating to pigmeat is hereby replaced by the following:
1.2,5 //  //  // Products  // Agricultural conversion rates  //  //  // 1.2.3.4.5 //  // 1 ECU = . . . Dr   // Applicable until   // 1 ECU = . . . Dr   // Applicable for   //    //  //   //   //   // 'Pigmeat   // 119,008   // 4 October 1987  // 119,824   // 5 October 1987'   //    //   //   //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities
It shall apply with effect from 5 October 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 October 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
